pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.2_0: And he has not been given the three offenses.
pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.3_0: If he steals anything having a value of five _māsaka_ coins or more than five _māsakas_, he commits an offense entailing expulsion.

pli-tv-pvr1.10:2.5_0: If he steals anything having a value of a _māsaka_ or less than a _māsaka_, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
